favourite.article: This hymn summarises the highest purpose of God from the facts of the Bible. God the Father is gold (God's attribute), God the Son is the pearl and God the Spirit is transforming us into the materials for building up the New Jerusalem. Lord thank You for Your words and mercy.

Praise the Lord! Our God is a God of purpose! He would have worthless me and all the saints transformed into precious materials for the building up of His Body, the church, His bride glorious! Hallelujah!
